## Problem 1
```{r}
x <- c(2.2, 7.8, -4.4, 0.0, -1.2, 3.9, 4.9, -5.7, -7.9, -4.9, 28.7, 4.9)
x.ascending <- sort(x, decreasing = FALSE)
Q1 <- quantile(x, .25)
Q3 <- quantile(x, .75)
IQR <- Q3-Q1
```

The first quartile is -4.53, the third quartile is 4.9, the interquartile range is 9.43.
